item.description:
Everyone really enjoyed the brunch at LJ's BBQ a few weeks ago...and have asked that we go back again. So...please join us on November 13th as we work our way through the awesome brunch menu at LJ's!

LJ's BBQ is one of the favorite bbq spots in the Providence area. They will be serving both the brunch and lunch menus when we are there. To get more specifics of the menu check them out here: http://www.ljsbbq.com....

If you have any questions let me know and hope to see you there!!
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Brunch at LJ's BBQ (Again)!
